org.ietf.nea.pb.message

Interface PbMessageValueErrorBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TnccsMessageValueBuilder, TransmissionObjectBuilder<TnccsMessageValue>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PbMessageValueErrorBuilderIetf

    public interface PbMessageValueErrorBuilder
extends TnccsMessageValueBuilder
    Generic builder to build a TNCCS error message value compliant to RFC 5793. It can be used in a fluent way.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PbMessageValueErrorBuilder setErrorCode(int errorCode)
      Sets the code describing the error.

      Sets the error flags encoded as byte.

      Sets the additional error parameter.
      PbMessageValueErrorBuilder setErrorVendorId(long errorVendorId)
      Sets the error vendor ID.
